channel.title: **Project-Xile** 667 RSPS - WE'RE BACK! PVP, Bosses, GE, Minigames! Events!
channel.description:
[img]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/9243/bbabd9865f99459fa751fa3.png[/img]
[url=http://projectxile.6te.net][img]http://i.imgur.com/2VY47cq.png[/img][/url] [url=http://projectxile.freeforums.org][img]http://i.imgur.com/VSuy8f4.png[/img][/url] [url=http://projectxile.6te.net/webclient.html][img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/582/d0cf35267e86433b945f271.png[/img][/url]
[size=36pt][font=impact]PROJECT-XILE IS BACK![/font][/size] [size=15pt]Fully working Grand Exchange! [size=15pt]Clanwars! [size=15pt]Fully customized dicing and FUN AREA! [size=15pt]1B TICKETS ! [size=15pt]Customizable Project-Xile cape! [size=15pt]Shops - Crystal chest! [size=15pt]Daily updates and events! [size=15pt]VPS Hosted 10GB! [size=15pt]24/7! [size=15pt]Lag Free server! [size=15pt]Stable Economy! [size=15pt]Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic! [size=15pt]Professional and active Staff!
[size=20pt]AND LOTS MORE!
[size=25pt][font=impact]XILES YOUTUBE[/font][/size]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gLZMGiPRBNc[/youtube] [b]Grand Exchange[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rVOv7s1.png[/img] [i][b]Fully working SPECS, AGS,CLAWS ETC[/b][/i] [img]http://i.imgur.com/eRHyT9b.png[/img] [i][b]Emotes and COMP cape emote[/b][/i] [img]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at102915PM.png[/img] [i][b]Duel Arena, And curses![/b][/i] Accessed by doing ::commands and typing miningames [img]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at52724PM.png[/img] [i][b]Lots of commands![/b][/i] Accessed by doing ::commands [img]http://i.imgur.com/CFg38O3.png[/img] [i][b]Fully working dungeon and rewards![/b][/i] Accessed by doing ::dungeon [img]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/dungeon2.png[/img] [i][b]QBD Dungeon / BOSS![/b][/i] Accessed by talking to Mr.EX at home [img]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at51946PM.png[/img] [i][b]Nex![/b][/i] Drops [b]TORVA, PERNIX AND MORE[/b] [img]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at52038PM.png[/img] [i][b]Male and Female character Option![/b][/i] Access by doing ::female [img]http://i.imgur.com/g0TAWFq.png[/img] [size=12pt][i][b]SHOPS! Not all of them[/b][/i][/size]A ccess by going home and talking to npcs near bank! [i][b]Armour store![/b][/i][img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1824/d678d3cdf90f5ff2a48c932.png[/img] [i][b]Token store![/b][/i] [img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/1495/da74c2acf92e5ea5b361a93.png[/img] [i][b]Skilling store![/b][/i] [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/1076/b1344e4b19c2264e6bf7878.png[/img] [i][b]FISHING![/b][/i] Accessed by talking to Skilling specialist at ::home [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2v02938.png[/img] [b]Information about the server![/b]
[b]Daily Updates And events![/b] Project-Xile has daily updates, and events each 24hrs - the updates are awesome, new items etc, With Project-Xile you'll have the latest version!
[b]Skiling and training![/b] To Train in Project-Xile just do, ::train or ::train2 (train2 is for higher level training), to skill talk to Skilling Specialist at ::home, near mr.ex - easy skilling!
[b]PVM and BOSSES![/b] In Project-Xile we have many bosses, and soon to be custom bosses! We even have 1b TICKETS if you've sur passed 1B and need to get more then 2147M.
[size=15pt]JOIN NOW[/size]! OWNER IS[b]: JAKE[/b] AND CO-OWNER IS[b]: REV[/b] --------------------- Website:[url=http://projectxile.6te.net]http://projectxile.6te.net[/url] Client: [url=http://projectxile.6te.net/ProjectXile667.jar]http://projectxile.6te.net/ProjectXile667.jar[/url] Webclient: [url=http://projectxile.6te.net/webclient.html]http://projectxile.6te.net/webclient.html[/url]
